data.name: The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku is the first part of a (hopeful) trilogy following the friendships, hardships, and path of Amimi, an 18 year old student who's recent move from home has left her succumbed to a new high school and new life without the friends she's had by her side. But as a few weeks pass by, Amimi gets to know Uta, another student recently transferred living the same issues that Amimi is going through. While the chemistry is, well, off to say the least, a budding friendship is soon to be made, and Amimi's high school life will change: like the night sky from the bang of a Firework.

NOTE: The demo shows a work-in-progress that is missing key components that will be updated and applied later in the development process. The demo is more to show off the story, characters, and give a taste of what is to come.

Thank you to all that play and I can't wait to hear what you think!

> Part 1 of The Sound of Fireworks Trilogy, TSOF: The Haiku is a single path/ending visual novel about love, acceptance, and a good ol' awkward budding teenage friendship.

Demo Length: 3 Chapters

data.short_description: TSOF: The Haiku is a single path/ending visual novel about love, acceptance, and a good ol' awkward budding teenage friendship. The demo includes the title's first 3 chapters.

fullgame.name: The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any NVIDIA or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Integrated Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: TSOF: The Haiku contains Mild Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, and Written Scenes of Bullying.
